cnet.com/2015/05/playstation-plus-free-g.snippet: Sony on Wednesday announced the list of games that PlayStation Plus members can download free in May 2015. PlayStation 4 owners get a total of five free games, while four freebies are up for grabs on PlayStation Vita, and three for PlayStation 3.
